allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement TrueTicket NFT-based ticketing platform

Complete implementation of a fair, scalp-resistant ticketing platform:

Smart Contracts (Solidity):
- TrueTicketNFT.sol: ERC-721 ticket with transfer hooks and check-in
- EventFactory.sol: Factory using Beacon Proxy pattern for events
- PricingController.sol: Resale price cap enforcement (fixed, percentage, absolute)
- RoyaltyDistributor.sol: Multi-beneficiary royalty splits
- Marketplace.sol: Secondary market with price cap enforcement

Database (Prisma):
- Complete schema with User, Event, TicketTier, Ticket, Purchase models
- Support for blockchain sync and transaction tracking

Frontend (Next.js 14):
- Privy integration for embedded wallets + Web3 wallet support
- TanStack Query + Zustand for state management
- Landing page, event browsing, and checkout flows
- Blockchain abstraction - users see "tickets" not "NFTs"

API Routes:
- Events API with filtering, search, and pagination
- Event creation with tier configuration

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(# Try installing solc with brew brew list solidity || brew install solidity 2>&1)
Bash(# Check if forge is available which forge || echo ""Forge not installed"" # Try installing foundry curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz)

Bash(# Check network connectivity curl -s --max-time 5 https://google.com && echo ""Internet OK"" || echo ""No internet"" # Check if maybe solc needs to be downloaded ls -la ~/.cache/hardhat-nodejs/compilers-v2/)
Bash(ssh root@trueticket.me "cd /var/www/trueticket && git pull origin main && npm install && npm run build && pm2 restart trueticket")
Bash(ssh root@trueticket.me "cd /var/www/trueticket && docker logs trueticket 2>&1 | tail -50")
